summary: Flask is a web framework for Python based on Werkzeug, Jinja 2 and good intentions. It is considered a micro-framework, but don't get the "micro" part fool you; Flask can do everything the "others" can do, many times in a simpler, leaner way. This session will introduce you to Flask as an engine to build RESTful web services.
title: Writing RESTful web services with Flask
